A Brush with the Dark





I Awoke in Neriak to find images of the Priest of Discord plastered over every building
and hiding in EVERY shadow!



His face was everywhere! Discord was the dictator here. I, new prey.
Unscupted by the doctrine. I felt him watching me with evil glee and I thought,
"Why not? I should join him. I would be safe at last."





No!!! I Mustn't! But the pull....His face! Everywhere! A subtile deception dancing in his eyes....




As I pondered his expression I found my hand resting comfortingly upon
that old dusty book stored away in my pack. It was then that I recognized the nature of that powerful stare.
I decided it would be best if I moved on. fast....




I fled Neriak and that face to the closest zone i could find... Lavastorm....





I did not find refuge amongst the Lava Crawlers...
In fact, My dilemma became worse when I spied the dark face in the clouds!
Was Innoruk more then just a myth to scared Children?
Had I seen his face????




I sought out Grobb and the company of Trolls after that.





But Grobb too tried to make me ill with seasickness.
I closed my eyes and ran for the swamps...










In the Swamps I found a sort of comfort. H R Geiger would have felt comfortable too...










And thus my night of madness ended - or at least I do not remember what happened after that. When I awoke later my world was as it had always been. All I have as evidence of my experience is this story and my pictures. Many refuse to believe my tale as it is too disturbing to their reality. If you are this way then I understand. But talk to any enchantress and they will tell you, reality has many faces...


Be safe and may your gods look upon you favorably in your adventures. Thank you for sharing this one with me.


Greater Faydark
Qeynos
Neriak, Lavastorm and Grobb
